attr.title: Pixel Wheels
attr.desc: Pixel Wheels is a free, top‑down retro-style arcade racer featuring dozens of creative tracks and a variety of vehicles with unique characteristics. Players can collect fun bonuses like missiles, guns, and mines to jostle rivals and scramble their path to the finish line.
attr.inst: Ready to run! If you wish to update the game, just replace "gamefiles/pixelwheels.jar" with your updated file.
